Overall the rooms leave a lot to be desired. As other reviews mention, I found random stains on my walls and the crevice between the floor and the shower was full of dust. It doesnâ€™t seem like housekeeping cares about doing more than cleaning the toilet, sink, and the floors.

Additionally, the AC was incredibly loud when it ran, didnâ€™t cool the room adequately even considering the fact it doesnâ€™t run at night.

Finally, there was only 1 electrical outlet in the room which wasnâ€™t by the bed which made charging your phone overnight difficult. The USB plug next to the bed didnâ€™t seem to work as my phone still lost a charge while plugged in.

Finally, the shower itself had significant plumbing issues and didnâ€™t maintain consistent temperature: it would fluctuate from scalding hot to cold before temporarily reaching a pleasant temperature only to repeat the cycle.

At checkout the staff did not inquire if I had experienced any issues.

The only benefits were that the staff was excellent, the TV had Chromecast support (which was a very pleasant surprise), and the location. I checked into my room around 11:30AM and my single room was available which again was a very peasant surprise.

I wasnâ€™t expecting luxury for the price, but the general cleanliness plus the unacceptable shower temperatures make this a 2 star experience
